item.title: Americans are less anxious about trade wars and inflation. Yet they don’t have much confidence in the economy.
item.description: Americans are less anxious about the economy and less worried about inflation after the Trump administration reduced high U.S. tariffs and trade wars ...

item.title: A majority of Americans are making a big mistake when it comes to long-term care
item.description: People are banking on a government safety net that isn’t there.

item.title: Are you prepared to pay 10% more for Coca-Cola? That could be the result of a switch to cane sugar.
item.description: And there’s a possibility that other food and beverage companies may also reformulate their products, adding to the potential impact on consumers.

item.title: M&A chatter swirls around Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern. This is why a deal makes sense.
item.description: Buying Norfolk Southern could provide unique benefits to Union Pacific, such as the old Wabash line.

item.title: Only six dividend stocks pass a screen for quality — with yields up to 6.58%
item.description: Income-seeking investors need to look beyond yields to reduce the risk of suffering dividend cuts.
